entry.summary:
Author: LyricalDays

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 21,421Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 176

Summary: Unapproachable.That was the way Damian would describe Tim Drake. He belonged on another level and Damian could not help but be addicted to the only way he had found to make him lose control.It was also how Tim would talk about Damian Wayne. entry.title: castaway
entry.summary:
Author: starry_somnia

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,961Chapters: 3/10Kudos: 32

Summary: “It's not a phase, mom!” Except Damian’s rebellious streak has been going on since he was sixteen, and shows no sign of stopping anytime soon. The catalyst? His father deciding he was not leaving Wayne Enterprises to Damian when he retired, but to Tamara Fox and Timothy Drake; two outsiders.His world crashed down around him. Damian spent years of his life trying to fit in with his father’s family, and what did it get him? If his father didn’t place any importance on Damian or their legacy — why was he bothering? He fled Gotham, dropped off the face of the Earth, and has been doing who knows what across the globe. Answer: racing cars, studying art, and disappointing his mother. Which, honestly, he likes just fine. Then something complicates all of it.Damian has been given an ultimatum from both his mother and grandfather. Get engaged by his twenty-first birthday, or have all his trusts reabsorbed into Lazarus Incorporated. Plus, he is also cut off for the foreseeable future. Damian is forced to come up with an admittedly stupid plan, that has the unfortunate side effect of him having to reconcile with his father and his family.He doesn’t plan for Timothy Drake to screw it all up.

entry.title: Finding Tim Drake
entry.summary:
Author: Chaotic_evil_stuff

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 441,974Chapters: 125/150Kudos: 723

Summary: Tim returns to Gotham after long time with the Titans to focus more on Tim Drake rather than Red Robin and regain some normality. Damian, now 20 years old, has developed some respect for Tim in his absence. He tries his very best to make Tim feel welcomed. The fresh start for both boys allows them to become more than rivals, and much more than friends too.The years of their relationship unfolds as their lives change for better, for worse and with new (and unexpected) additions to their daily life. How will they manage them? How will it change them? Who and what is waiting for their chance to ruin it all? This is part 1 of my series and is still ongoing and updated regularly.Smut is on separate chapters, so if you're not into that, this can be read without it and still have a full cohesive story.

entry.title: 150 Shades of Bat
entry.summary:
Author: Mat_Vibes

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 41,626Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 149

Summary: “I require your assistance with something important,” Damian said, opening the notebook with solemn reverence. “It’s a delicate matter.”Tim squinted at a tab labeled ‘frottage, rooftop edition.’ “Is it tax fraud? Please tell me it’s tax fraud.”“No,” Damian said. He flipped three pages and adjusted a glossy photo held in place by a literal sewing needle. “There are 150 kinks I must test and evaluate prior to pursuing any romantic entanglements.”Tim stared.Damian continued. “I have organized them by category, severity, potential for logistical complications, and whether they require a pulley system.”“WHAT?!”Damian raised an eyebrow. “There’s no need to yell.”“You kidnapped me to show me your sex spreadsheet?!”

entry.title: Not Until You Say Goodbye
entry.summary:
Author: Mat_Vibes

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 92,396Chapters: 19/?Kudos: 39

entry.title: in a cruel nature
entry.summary:
Author: Anonymous

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,719Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 153

Summary: “I don’t understand why I have to accompany him.” Timothy groaned out as he rolled his eyes at Bruce’s orders. “It’s only for one night, Timothy.” Bruce insisted while maintaining his stoic attitude as he stood before Tim. Despite the lack of the cowl, Bruce spoke to him as if he was giving orders on the field, the gravitas in his voice was heavy. “Despite his nasty attitude, I doubt that there isn’t any desperate teenager out there willing to put up with it for one night.” Tim bitterly replied, and he wasn’t lying either. Damian had grown up into a fine man, inheriting both of his parents’ innate charm and attractiveness. “Please, Ducky.” Bruce pleaded, his voice softer with fondness as he called Tim his favorite pet name. “Fucking hell, alright!” Tim finally conceded at the sight of Bruce begging. “I’ll go to prom with Damian.” Under his breath, he added. “What a shitty fucking promposal.” “Do try to make yourself look decent, Drake.” At that moment, Damian appeared at the door. “I refuse to make a fool out of myself.” Damian takes Timothy Drake as his date for the Prom.
